title: Bed Cover (suzani), 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in chain and Bokhara couching stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Bed cover or suzani in cream-colored cotton embroidered in colored silks and lined with warp printed silk. Small red carnations fill the field, surrounded by a wide border of large, circular red flower heads and scrolling vines. Lined with two different warp print silks, a satin stripe and a ribbed silk with a figural design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bed Cover (suzani), 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in chain and Bokhara couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-18.
